metadata.title: CVE-2022-22707 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In lighttpd 1.4.46 through 1.4.63, the mod_extforward_Forwarded function of the mod_extforward plugin has a stack-based buffer overflow (4 bytes), as demonstrated by remote denial of service (daemon crash).

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
